title: Sidebar Bookmarks
description:
Make the most of your large screen with a smart sidebar—boost your bookmark management efficiency and browse smarter!
End-to-end encryption and private protection—double the security, manage your bookmarks with peace of mind!
One-click analysis and cleanup—streamline your bookmarks, keep your collection perfectly organized!
Smart recommendations and browsing history, seamlessly match bookmark content and easily trace key information for a more efficient browsing experience!
